function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Mandatory lockdowns and quarantines leading to reduced energy demand and greenhouse gas emissions","Impact":"Reduction in energy consumption and greenhouse gas emissions, potential economic impact on energy firms","Mitigation":"Investment in renewable energy sources, energy efficiency measures, and support for energy firms","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, energy-efficient technologies, carbon capture and storage","People":"Global population under lockdown, energy firms, governments","Owner":"Governments, energy companies, environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Severe restrictions on travel leading to reduced energy use and emissions from transportation","Impact":"Significant reduction in air and road transport activities, decrease in greenhouse gas emissions from the transport sector","Mitigation":"Promotion of remote work, investment in sustainable transportation, and development of low-emission vehicles","Technologies":"Telecommuting technologies, sustainable transportation technologies, electric and hybrid vehicles","People":"Travelers, transportation industry, commuters","Owner":"Transportation companies, governments, employers"},{"Description":"Impact on global energy supply chains and energy firms","Impact":"Disruption in energy supply chains, economic challenges for energy firms, potential job losses","Mitigation":"Diversification of energy sources, investment in resilient supply chains, and support for affected energy companies","Technologies":"Smart grid technology, renewable energy sources, supply chain management systems","People":"Energy firms, workers in the energy sector, consumers","Owner":"Energy companies, supply chain management organizations, governments"}]}
